parameters.inputSchema: {"properties": {"budget_attractiveness": {"title": "Budget Attractiveness", "type": "integer"}, "client_history": {"title": "Client History", "type": "integer"}, "post_freshness": {"title": "Post Freshness", "type": "integer"}, "skill_relevance": {"title": "Skill Relevance", "type": "integer"}, "primary_skill_focus": {"title": "Primary Skill Focus", "type": "boolean"}, "rationale": {"title": "Rationale", "type": "string"}}, "required": ["budget_attractiveness", "client_history", "post_freshness", "skill_relevance", "primary_skill_focus", "rationale"], "type": "object"}

parameters.text:
=You are an expert in AI recruitment.
Task:
1. From the given Upwork job description, extract all relevant skills, frameworks, and tools—whether explicitly mentioned or implied.
2. Normalize them (e.g., “Python 3” → “Python”).
3. Group them under categories: “Programming”, “NLP & RAG”, “Chatbots”, “Automation”, “Cloud”, “Data”.

Format: Always output valid JSON with six keys: “Programming”, “NLP & RAG”, “Chatbots”, “Automation”, “Cloud”, “Data”.

Examples:
Example 1 Input:

    “We need a Python developer to build an OpenAI‑powered chatbot using LangChain and Pinecone. Familiarity with Docker, AWS Lambda, and n8n is a plus.”

Example 1 Output:
{
  "Programming": ["Python"],
  "NLP & RAG": ["OpenAI API", "LangChain", "Pinecone"],
  "Chatbots": ["Custom GPT chatbot"],
  "Automation": ["n8n"],
  "Cloud": ["Docker", "AWS Lambda"],
  "Data": []
}

Example 2 Input:

    “Looking for an NLP engineer experienced in spaCy, NLTK, embeddings, vector databases (Weaviate), and prompt engineering. Must integrate with Make.com and Zapier.”

Example 2 Output:

{
  "Programming": [],
  "NLP & RAG": ["spaCy", "NLTK", "Embeddings", "Vector databases", "Prompt engineering"],
  "Chatbots": [],
  "Automation": ["Make.com", "Zapier"],
  "Cloud": [],
  "Data": []
}

Now process the Upwork job post below:
"""
Job Title:
{{ $('GetTabelRecords').item.json.title }}

Job Description:
{{ $('GetTabelRecords').item.json.description }}
"""

=Score the job post based on the following aspects.

## Budget Attractiveness (0–3 points):
- Hourly:
    * $0-34 ➔ 0 points
    * $35–49 ➔ 1 or 2 points
    * $50+ ➔ 3 points
- Fixed-Price:
    * $0-999 ➔ 0 points
    * $1k–4.9k ➔ 1 or 2 points
    * $5k+ ➔ 3 points

## Client History (0–3 points):
    * 1 pt if client_total_hires > 0.
    * 1 pt if client_total_feedback ≥ 4.5.
    * 1 pt if client_total_spent > 2k.

## Post Freshness (0–3 points):
    * 0–1 days ➔ 3 pts
    * 2–3 days ➔ 2 pts
    * 4–7 days ➔ 1 pt
    * 8–28 days ➔ 0 pts.

## Skill Relevance (0–5 points):
    * +5 pts: Job post explicitly requires 3+ skills from the given skills.
    * +3 pts: 2 skills match the given skills.
    * +1 pt: 1 skill aligns with the given skills
    * 0 pts: No overlap.

## Primary Skill Focus (Boolean):
    * True if either:
        1. The job title/description emphasizes skills matching the "Given Skills" as core requirements, OR
        2. >50% of mentioned technical requirements match the "Given Skills"
    * False if:
        1. Matching skills are listed as secondary/nice-to-have, OR
        2. Project primarily focuses on other domains with the "Given Skills" as supplementary

**Output Format**:
- Your output should be a JSON object as follows:
{
"budget_attractiveness": <Budget Attractiveness (0–3 points)>,
"client_history": <Client History (0–3 points)>,
"post_freshness": <Post Freshness (0–3 points)>,
"skill_relevance": <Skill Relevance (0–5 points)>,
"primary_skill_focus": <boolean>,
"rationale": <Concise explanation of scoring factors>
}

## Upwork job post:
{{ $('GetTabelRecords').item.json.title }}

{{ $('GetTabelRecords').item.json.description }}

## Upwork job post metadata:
{{ $('ConvertMetadataJsonToString').item.json.json_str }}

## Given skills:
1. General AI and Machine Learning
2. Natural Language Processing (NLP)
3. Large Language Models (LLMs), and LLM fine-tuning
4. Conversational AI and Chatbots
5. Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
6. AI Agents, Multi-Agent system
7. LLM Fine-Tuning Techniques
8. API Integration
9. Workflow Automation
10. Code-Based Tools such as [TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, AWS SageMaker, MLflow, Kubeflow, Azure ML, spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers, NLTK, Stanford NLP, LangChain, LlamaIndex, OpenAI API, Anthropic API, LoRA, QLoRA, Hugging Face Fine-Tuning, OpenAI Fine-Tuning API, Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT), LangGraph, CrewAI, AutoGen, Semantic Kernel, BabyAGI, Haystack, Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus, Docker, Kubernetes, Flask, FastAPI, AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Cloud AI, Rasa, PyCaret, Git].
11. No-Code/Low-Code Tools such as [Dialogflow, Microsoft Bot Framework, Alexa Skills, Google Actions, Botpress, Zapier, Make.com, n8n, Airtable, Voiceflow, Dify AI, Relevance AI, Akkio, No-code LLM Fine-Tuning (platforms like Dify), AutoML (Google AutoML, H2O LLM Studio), Data Annotation Tools (e.g., Label Studio)]

=You are an expert AI Engineer specializing in NLP, LLMs, RAG, chatbots, and AI automation. Craft a persuasive Upwork cover letter for a job post by combining the client’s requirements with the candidate’s skills and past projects.
The cover letter should resemble cover letters used by freelancers on Upwork.

## Inputs Provided:
### Job Post:
"""
{{ $('GetTabelRecords').item.json.title }}

{{ $('GetTabelRecords').item.json.description }}

"""
### Candidate’s Skills:
"""
NLP, Chatbots, text classification, LangChain, LlamaIndex, AWS, Azuer, CrewAI, AutoGen, LangGraph, LangSmith, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), AI agents, Multi-agent Systems, LLMs, LLM fine-tuning, RLHF, Supervised Fine-Tuning, Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning, LoRA, Open source LLMs, Information Extraction, Adapter Tuning, QLoRA, OpenAI, APIs, FastAPI, Databases, Automation, Workflow Automation, Autonomous Systems, no-code platforms (such as n8n, make.com, Relevance AI, Zapier, etc.)
"""
### Candidate’s Past Projects:
"""
1. AI-Powered CV Parser & Scoring System

        Description: Developed a GPT-4-driven pipeline to extract structured data (personal info, education, work history, skills) from unstructured CVs. Engineered a scoring algorithm to rank resumes against job descriptions with 94% micro f1 score (accuracy metric) , reducing hiring costs to about $1 per 1,000 CVs processed.

        Tools: LLMs, GPT-4, Python, NLP, RAG PyPDF, Unstructred.io, text extraction, cost-optimized workflows.

        Impact: Streamlined recruitment for HR clients, reducing manual screening time.

2. Real Estate Search Chatbot with RAG & Multi-Agent Workflow

        Description: Built a conversational AI chatbot that collects user preferences (bedrooms, location, budget) and dynamically generates SQL queries to fetch matching properties. Integrated RAG for answering FAQs from real estate PDFs (e.g., developers information, etc.), reducing customer search time.

        Tools: LLMs, LangChain, LangGraph, RAG, vector stores, OpenAI API, SQL, AI agent orchestration, AWS, Azure.


3. Upwork Job Matching Automation with n8n & AI Agents

        Description: Automated Upwork job discovery by fetching projects via API, filtering them with AI, and storing matches in Postgres database. Reduced job-search time by prioritizing roles aligned with my skills.

        Tools: n8n, LLMs, Upwork API, Postgres, Python scripting, automation, AI agents, GPT-4, no code platforms.

        Impact: Scaled proposal submissions for high-relevance projects.
"""

## Instructions:

### Analyze the Job Post:

        * Identify the client’s key requirements (e.g., “LLM fine-tuning,” “multilingual chatbot,” “AI automation workflow”).

        * Note industry-specific terms or tools mentioned (e.g., “Hugging Face,” “AWS,” “CI/CD pipelines”).

### Match Skills & Projects:

        * Prioritize skills/projects that align with the job’s keywords.

        * Highlight quantifiable achievements (e.g., “improved accuracy by 25%”).

### Structure the Letter:

        * Opening: Start with enthusiasm and personalization (use the client’s name if known).

        * Body:

            Mention 1-2 relevant projects, focusing on results and tools used.

            Explain how your skills solve their specific problem (e.g., “My experience with RAG pipelines ensures accurate document retrieval for your legal chatbot”).

        * Closing: Add a call to action (e.g., “Let’s discuss how I can deploy a scalable chatbot for your SaaS platform”).
        * Add the following as a final paragraph (keep it concise):

          "As someone passionate about AI and automation, I discovered your job using a custom system I built with n8n and AI agents to score Upwork posts. Your project ranked highly for its [add specific strengths about this specific job that aligns with my skills]. Even this draft was initially generated by AI, but every word has been reviewed by me to ensure it aligns with your needs. I’d love to bring this same efficiency and precision to your project!"

    * Tone & Format:
        Natural language: Use contractions (e.g., "I’m" instead of "I am"), avoid jargon unless necessary, and vary sentence length.

        Avoid clichés: Phrases like “leveraging cutting-edge solutions” or “synergistic workflows” are banned.
      
        Flow: Start with a personal connection to the project (e.g., “Your focus on X resonated with me because…”).

        Keep it concise (200-300 words).

        Use bullet points for technical achievements if needed.

        Include a portfolio link if available (e.g., GitHub, live demo).

        The generated cover letter should be in plain text (don't use Markdown formatting)


## Output Format:
	* Your output should be in JSON format: {"cover_letter": <your generated cover letter in plain text">}

parameters.pythonCode:
# Loop over input items and add a new field called 'myNewField' to the JSON of each one
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

ten_days_earlier = datetime.today() - timedelta(days=10)
ten_days_earlier = ten_days_earlier.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')

for item in _input.all():
  item.json.to_delete = ten_days_earlier
return _input.all()

nodes.name: GetProjects
nodes.notes:
This step is mandatory, as the subsequent node of adding rows to the created sheets requires access the output of the CreateGoogleSheet node.

And for any node, to be able to access a previous node, it should be attached to it.

parameters.content:
## Combine resutls
  













#### Combine the features of high score jobs with their cover letters

parameters.pythonCode:
# Loop over input items and add a new field called 'myNewField' to the JSON of each one
import json
from datetime import date, datetime

today = date.today()
formatted_date = today.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
date1 = datetime.strptime(formatted_date, "%Y-%m-%d").date()

print(date1)
for item in _input.all():
  # item.json.today_date = formatted_date
  item.json.post_freshness = (date1 - datetime.strptime(item.json.published_date, "%Y-%m-%d").date()).days
return _input.all()

parameters.content: #### The sole purpose of this node is to provide the `AddTopProjects` node with access to both the sheet information from the `CreateGoogleSheet` node and the projects coming from the `Sort` node.

json.title: Build simple custom GPT
json.description: A short take - building a GPT by inputting specific set material and programming it to behave in correct manner. much of the task is gathering the relevant text fort input. end product should be the custom GPT shared with me

json.title: Build us a CustomGPT Chatbot for Canadian Election
json.description:
Project Brief: VoteGPT – Custom Chatbot for Canadian Voters
Deadline to Launch: April 17, 2025

We’re looking for a skilled partner to help us build a custom AI chatbot for our project VoteGPT. The goal is to help Canadian voters explore and understand the party platforms and promises of the major federal parties in a clear, engaging way.

What We’re Building
VoteGPT will be a conversational AI tool trained on party platforms and other official sources. Voters should be able to ask questions like:
“Which party has the strongest climate plan?”
“What do the parties say about housing affordability?”
“I care about mental health and Indigenous rights — which party aligns most with my values?”

We previously built an early version using an out-of-the-box GPT solution at https://votegpt.ca, but the responses were overly cautious, limited to basic excerpts, and lacked real synthesis or user-friendly recommendations. We’re looking to improve this with a new model. 

Key Features We Want
Custom GPT-style chatbot trained on the 2025 party platforms
Embeddable on a landing page (iframe or widget)
Citations included in answers to verify claims
Reduced hallucinations (trustworthy, factual responses)
Analytics dashboard (user activity, common questions, etc.)
Custom prompts and follow-up actions, e.g., invite user to take action after chat


Technical Direction
We’ve been advised that OpenAI’s Custom GPTs could be a good fit, but we’re open to your recommendations for the best approach and stack.

Timeline
We want to **launch by Thursday, April 17, 2025** — so this is a fast turnaround.

To Respond
Please send a brief email covering:
A brief proposal or outline of how you’d approach this
Estimated cost
Timeline to deliver
Examples of similar work or previous experience (if any)

We’re ready to move quickly. Thanks!

json.title: Voice AI Agent Development
json.description:
We are seeking a skilled developer to create a workflow involving Voice AI agent to handle lead qualification for clinical trials. The steps will be the following:
- Pull lead info and initial qualification questions from Mailchimp
- Determine if initial qualification questions meet criteria for AI voice call
- Initiate outbound voice call when new leads meeting initial qualification criteria are met
- Determine if info called during AI voice call meets criteria for scheduling with human follow up agent [determines if there is match between any available trials based on all information collected] (via LLM plus matching rules)
- If criteria are met, schedule a call with human (or pass on to live human if human is available) and summarize information for human call (via LLM)

You should have extensive experience with automation platform (like make.com / n8n etc), voice AI platforms (Retell/VAPI), Airtable. We will be using Cekura AI for testing and observability.

json.title: AI-Powered Data Integration & Analytics System for Multi-Unit Franchise Business
json.description:
I own and operate a portfolio of franchise restaurant businesses and am looking to build a comprehensive, centralized data platform that consolidates information from various sources to drive better decision-making and improve profitability across all locations.

Goals of the Project:
	•	Create a centralized database or engine that integrates data from various systems (POS, accounting software, labor scheduling tools, etc.).
	•	Develop an AI-powered engine/agent that can:
	•	Analyze financial and operational data.
	•	Provide recommendations to improve profitability on a location-by-location basis.
	•	Answer analytical questions like:
	•	“What is the average EBITDA of each location over the past 5 months?”
	•	“Which location has had the biggest change in labor cost % month-over-month?”
	•	Surface key KPIs and generate visual dashboards.
	•	Identify trends and outliers in performance.

Ideal Candidate Will Have Experience With:
	•	Data integration from platforms like Toast, QuickBooks, Paycor, or other common tools used in the restaurant/franchise space.
	•	Building dashboards and visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, or custom dashboards).
	•	AI/ML-driven analytics tools (including use of LLMs or agents).
	•	Understanding or experience with tools/concepts like Model Context Protocol (MCP) is a plus, especially if it can help structure context for querying business data.
	•	Backend development and API integration.

Bonus Points For:
	•	Prior work with franchise or multi-unit businesses.
	•	Ability to propose scalable architecture for long-term growth.
	•	Offering guidance on best practices for structuring financial and operational data for AI analysis.

To Apply:
Please include:
	•	A brief summary of relevant experience.
	•	Examples of similar work you’ve done (screenshots or links are welcome).
	•	Any initial thoughts on how you’d approach a project like this.

json.title: AI Engineer for MCP Building and Agent Buildouts

You will be responsible for designing and implementing solutions that enhance our systems' capabilities and efficiency. If you are passionate about AI and have a proven track record in this domain, we want to hear from you!

json.title: Operations Needed for AI-Powered Marketing Agency (Workflow Builder + Automation-EXPERT)
json.description:
(Workflow Builder + Automation-Savvy)
Dreamwork Labs is a fast-growing, productized marketing agency helping brands scale with AI-powered systems across content, SEO, cold email, and paid media.

We're hiring an Operations + Systems Manager to help us deliver results across all of our offers — using tools like ClickUp, Notion, Slack, GoHighLevel, Make, Zapier, and ChatGPT.

💼 Your Role:
You’ll build, optimize, and manage delivery systems for:

Our Growth Engine (social content + engagement workflows)

Our SEO blog engine 

Our cold outbound system (lead sourcing + Instantly + CRM handoff)

Local SEO paid ad client onboarding + reporting

General project and task management inside ClickUp

You’ll help turn our Notion SOPs and AI prompts into automated or semi-automated workflows, then manage client timelines, comms, and QA as needed.

🧠 You Should Be:
Extremely organized, process-driven, and tech fluent, always thinking of new ideas to make things easier. 

Familiar with automating via Make, Zapier, GoHighLevel

Experienced with project management in ClickUp, Notion, Slack

Able to QA ChatGPT output, trigger workflows, and improve SOPs

Comfortable working async + independently in a fast-moving environment

🌍 This Is For You If:
You love building and optimizing systems more than doing the tasks manually

You’ve worked with lean remote teams or founders before

You’re interested in AI + no-code tools and want to grow into a senior ops role

You want to help scale an agency to millions in revenue with minimal headcount ensuring you and our CEO build together long term. 

MUST KNOW HOW TO AUTOMATE. (Notion, clickup, gohighlevel, Twitter, Wordpress, etc). 

📌 Details:
Full-time (40 hrs/week)

$/hr depending on experience

Fully remote

Growth opportunity to become our Head of Ops / COO over time

✅ To Apply:
Tell us what systems you’ve built before

Share your favorite automation stack

Include 1 thing you'd improve about this job description (optional but fun)

Looking forward to building something great with you.

json.title: Custom APIFY Actor Developer for LinkedIn Messaging Automation
json.description:
We are looking for an experienced APIFY actor developer to create a custom solution for automating LinkedIn messaging. The task involves building an actor that can send personalized messages to our First Connections on LinkedIn based on a provided LinkedIn search URL.

Project Requirements:
Input Parameters:
A LinkedIn search URL containing only our First Connections.
A daily message quota (number of messages to send per day).
Message Personalization:
The actor should allow us to input a custom message template with placeholders for personalization. For example:
Hello (FirstName),
I am recruiting for a "Python Developer" Contract position for our client in New York City.
If you are interested in learning more about this opportunity, please call me or email me.
You can also click here (this is a clickable link) to speak to my AI voice agent, who can answer all your questions related to this job.

Thanks,
Taj Haslani
(recruiterEmail)
(recruiterPhoneNumber)
The actor should dynamically replace placeholders like (FirstName), (recruiterEmail), and (recruiterPhoneNumber) with the appropriate values.
Message Sending Logic:
The actor should send the specified number of messages per day (daily quota).
If the search results contain more profiles than the daily quota, the actor should continue sending messages the next day until all profiles are contacted.
Error Handling:
The actor should handle potential LinkedIn restrictions (e.g., rate limits or message limits) and retry as needed.
Deliverables:
A fully functional APIFY actor that meets the above requirements.
Documentation on how to use the actor, including how to input the LinkedIn search URL, set the daily quota, and customize the message template.
Skills Required:
Strong experience with APIFY and actor development.
Familiarity with LinkedIn automation and its limitations.
Proficiency in JavaScript/Node.js (or relevant programming languages for APIFY development).
Understanding of web scraping and API integration.

json.title: AI-Powered Contract Review Platform for Insurance
json.description:
REview Explained in Simple Terms

Imagine a tool that works like a supercharged legal assistant designed specifically for the reinsurance industry. That’s REview. Here’s what it does:
	•	Smart Contract Review:
Users (like underwriters or legal teams) upload reinsurance contracts along with important details (such as program names, contract IDs, team info, etc.). REview automatically processes these documents.
	•	Multiple AI Engines for Accuracy:
Instead of relying on a single set of eyes, REview uses at least two different AI systems (like OpenAI and Anthropic). These AI models review the same contract and compare their answers. If they disagree on something, the tool flags it so a human can check it. This cross-checking ensures a higher level of accuracy and reliability.
	•	Customizable Q&A for Underwriters:
Underwriters can set up a list of standard questions they always want answered for each contract. When a contract is uploaded, REview automatically fills in answers to these questions based on its analysis. This saves time and ensures consistent information across contracts.
	•	Real-Time Collaborative Tools:
Just like Google Docs, REview allows users to work together on the same document. People can highlight important sections, leave comments, and make corrections all within the platform. This makes teamwork more efficient and helps resolve issues quickly.
	•	Continuous Learning:
When a human reviews flagged differences and makes decisions, that feedback is used to improve the AI over time. This means the tool gets smarter and more tailored to each company’s unique requirements.

In summary, REview is designed to simplify and streamline the legal review process for reinsurance contracts. It minimizes errors, speeds up decision-making, and ensures that each company’s unique needs are met—all while providing a secure and collaborative environment. This makes it an invaluable tool for companies looking to modernize and automate a traditionally manual and error-prone process.

json.title: Quantitative Consultant for RNN/ML-Based Auto Trading System (9 Active Models)
json.description:
Description:

We’re seeking a seasoned quantitative or machine learning consultant to help us optimize our RNN-based auto trading system, which currently operates with 9 active models. The system trades a wide range of Forex and CFD instruments across multiple time frames.

While the infrastructure is in place, complex and fully operational, we are facing challenges in achieving consistent profitability. We’re looking for an expert to review the system, identify weaknesses, and recommend improvements in both the modeling and trading logic.
Responsibilities:

    Analyze the current 9-model RNN architecture

    Identify inefficiencies or areas impacting profitability

    Recommend strategy or logic improvements

    Advise on volatility handling and risk optimization

    Optional: Suggest training or model refinement strategies

Requirements:

    Deep experience with RNNs and time-series forecasting

    Strong background in algorithmic trading and financial modeling

    Ideally has built or consulted on a profitable trading system

    Clear, actionable communication and strategic thinking

Scope:

    Short-term consulting with potential for continued engagement

    Open to hourly or fixed rate, depending on experience

json.title: CTO Needed for AI Layer 2 Project on Blockchain
json.description: We are seeking a Chief Technology Officer (CTO) with expertise in AI and blockchain technology to lead our innovative Layer 2 project on the Solana blockchain. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in artificial intelligence and experience in the crypto space. Responsibilities include overseeing technical development, participating in AMAs, and guiding our team in implementing cutting-edge solutions. If you are passionate about AI and blockchain and have the skills to shape our technology strategy, we would love to hear from you!

json.title: Technical Co-Founder (AI & Automation) – Help Build AI & Automation Services Agency
json.description:
NO AGENCIES - looking for a Co-founder/Partner/individual. 

 About the Vision
We're launching a boutique AI & Automation agency helping B2B companies-especially in SaaS, e-commerce, and services-save cost and scale faster by automating their marketing operations and workflows using tools like GPT-4, Make, Zapier, Notion AI, HubSpot AI, and more.

Think: A McKinsey-style AI consultancy for marketing teams - small, sharp, scalable.

🧩 What We’re Looking For
We’re looking for a Co-Founder / CTO who can lead the technical side of our delivery, from advising on tools to building automations and AI workflows.

You might be:
-A senior AI/automation consultant looking to build your own thing.
-A PhD student or technical specialist with deep knowledge in AI/ML, workflow automation, and business process mapping.
-Someone who’s already playing with GPT agents, Zapier/Make integrations, or AI copilots — and gets excited about solving real business problems.

🔧 Your Role
-Lead the technical delivery of client projects: audits, automation flows, AI integration.
-Help build out internal toolkits, templates, and GPT workflows to scale the business.
-Collaborate on productised services and recurring offers (e.g. AI audits, AI content engines).
-Stay on top of the latest AI tools and help select, test, and implement them with clients.

Join strategy calls and client-facing demos when needed — we’re building together.

🛠️ Tech & Tools We Work With
-OpenAI / Claude / Gemini / LangChain
-Zapier / Make / HubSpot / Webflow
-Notion, Airtable, Slack integrations
-GA4, Meta Ads, Google Sheets automation
-Automation-first mindsets, no-code/low-code workflows, and maybe agent-based setups down the line

💼 About the Founder
-Former award-winning CMO with 15+ years in B2B and SaaS.
-Built and exited businesses, featured on StarterStory and worked with companies like AT&T & The Economist
-Strong personal brand, deep LinkedIn network of marketers and founders = instant warm lead pool.

Ready to go: Website, positioning, service packages, and GTM strategy are already in motion.

💰 The Offer
-Co-founder level role – equity (initially 50/50 profit share)
-No salary upfront, but huge upside in early client revenues + exit potential

You get to own and shape the tech vision of the agency


Total freedom on when, how, and where you work — as long as things ship 🚢

🎯 Our Goal
To build a lean, high-margin, AI-powered agency that scales via productised services, recurring retainers, and eventually strategic IP/toolkits — making us attractive for acquisition in 3–5 years.

📩 How to Apply
Please include "AI & Automate Co-founder" in your application so we know you read this.

Tell us:
Why this is the right fit for you.
Your experience with AI tools, workflow automation, or technical delivery.
Share links to anything you’ve built (GitHub, Notion, Zapier templates, GPT workflows, etc.).

json.title: 1 -2 Hours of Consulting work related to AI agent Deployment
json.description: 1 -2 Hours of Consulting work related to AI agent Deployment

json.title: Fine-tuning & matching ecommerce products from different merchants - immediate hire
json.description:
Hi,

We have a comparison website which compares various products sold by various merchants.

We have already scrapped all products from over 42 merchants (850k products).

We need the exact same products to be matched across various merchants. 

Note: the complexity of this job is to match the same product across multiple different merchants when one product may have different variations. so for example a "dulux 5L brilliant white paint" must be matched the exact same product being sold on different merchants and not the 2.5L version of it etc.

You MUST BE AN EXPERT in fine tuning and have proven track record of working on AI projects, you MUST  NOT apply if you do not have experience of doing complex AI projects.

json.title: Automation Expert Needed | N8n, Make, Airtable, Voiceflow, Bland AI, Vapi AI
json.description:
We’re building something massive—and we need elite-level talent to help scale it.

I’m looking for a battle-tested automation expert who’s fluent in:

N8n

Make (Integromat)

Airtable

Voiceflow

Bland AI

Vapi AI

You’ll be helping build plug-and-play templates for both:

My own AI agency's internal systems

Multiple industries (fitness, real estate, med spas, financial services, etc.)

What You’ll Be Doing:

Building clean, scalable automations using the platforms above

Creating modular workflows that can be easily customized by industry

Integrating conversational AI flows (chat + voice)

Mapping data structures and APIs in Airtable

Collaborating with me to innovate solutions and systemize growth

Documenting everything clearly so it can be scaled, cloned, and sold

Requirements:

Hands-on experience with ALL listed tools

Strategic thinker who can reverse-engineer business operations

Clear communicator with fast response time

Organized and process-driven (you love clean systems)

Bonus if you have experience in SaaS, AI lead gen, or DFY agency services

Preferred:

Students or graduates from “The Real World” (Tate’s business school) – I value action-takers, not excuse-makers

This is not a one-off gig. I’m looking to build a long-term relationship with someone who wants to be part of a fast-growing, no-BS agency that’s going global.

Think you’re the one?

json.title: MVP Build – Smart Chat Assistant with Memory + Text Interface (AI + Messaging)
json.description:
We’re looking for a full-stack developer (or small team) to help us bring a lightweight AI-based messaging assistant to life.

This is not a chatbot in a box — it’s a smart agent that lives inside group conversations (via SMS or messaging platform) and helps users stay organized, aligned, and accountable in a human way.

json.title: Next-Gen Web & Mobile Application in the AI Space
json.description:
AIHub Technology is building a powerful platform that brings together the world’s leading AI models in one unified, intuitive experience. 
Our goal is to make AI more accessible, collaborative, and deeply useful—whether for individuals, teams, or enterprises.

We’re now looking for a high-performing technical team (or strong individual full-stack engineers) to help us design the first version of our web and mobile applications.

The AIHub platform will allow users to:
 • Chat with multiple LLMs like ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Mistral, and more
 • Upload files (PDFs, Docs, etc.) and get contextual AI-powered summaries, insights
 • Build their own custom AI agents with memory, tools, and knowledge bases
 • Search the web using AI in research mode with citations and source transparency
 • Access multi-modal tools: image analysis, text-to-image generation, and voice interaction
 • Collaborate in shared workspaces with teams on chats, files, and AI agents

All of this - inside a seamless, beautifully designed platform available on web and mobile.

Key Features
 1. Multi-AI Chat Interface
 • Real-time chat with selectable AI models
 • Side-by-side comparison of answers
 • Message streaming and session memory
 2. Document upload & Analysis
 • File parser + vector database integration (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate)
 • Semantic search + chat over documents
 3. Prompt workspace
 • Save, reuse, and version prompts
 • Shared prompt templates for teams
 4. AI-Powered research mode
 • Uses web-connected models like Perplexity
 • Displays references, links, and summaries
 5. Voice & multi-modal interaction
 • Talk-to-AI with Whisper and TTS integrations
 • Support for images, PDFs, code snippets, etc.
 6. Team workspaces & collaboration Tools
 • Shared AI agents, chat histories, and document interactions
 • Role-based access and user permissions
 7. Custom AI Agent Builder
 • Let users create, configure, and deploy their own AI agents
 • Plug in files, context, tools, and preferred models

Tech Stack (open to suggestions)

Frontend:
 • Web: React + Tailwind
 • Mobile: React Native (or Flutter)
 • Real-time: WebSocket / Socket.IO

Backend:
 • Node.js | Python or Java
 • PostgreSQL + Redis
 • AI Tooling: LangChain, LlamaIndex, OpenAI API, Claude API, SerpAPI

Infrastructure:
 • GCP / AWS 
 • CI/CD pipeline, monitoring, and scalable architecture

We’re open to partnering with a dedicated dev shop or hiring a small, focused technical team (2–5 people max) who are:
 • Passionate about AI at least 5 released projects in this niche
 • Experienced in developing scalable web & mobile apps
 • Familiar with LLMs, APIs, and prompt engineering
 • Comfortable working in startup mode: lean, iterative, and fast

json.title: Crypto AI Agent Development
json.description:
We are seeking an experienced developer to create a cutting-edge AI agent specialized in cryptocurrency trading and analysis. The ideal candidate will possess expertise in AI algorithms, machine learning, and blockchain technology. You will be responsible for designing and implementing the agent to analyze market trends, make trading decisions, and optimize strategies. If you have a passion for crypto and AI, we want to hear from you! 

**Relevant Skills:**
- Artificial Intelligence (AI)
- Machine Learning (ML)
- Cryptocurrency Trading
- Blockchain Technology
- Data Analysis
- Python or R Programming
- API Integration

json.title: Seeking Low-Code Botpress & n8n Expert for High-Quality Consultancy Projects
json.description:
Job Description:

We are searching for a seasoned low-code expert specializing in Botpress and n8n to join our consultancy team on a freelance basis. We require a professional with a proven track record in developing robust, scalable, and innovative solutions using these tools.

Key Responsibilities:

Development & Integration: Design, build, and integrate low-code solutions using Botpress for chatbot automation and n8n for workflow automation, ensuring high-quality, production-ready deployments. You will hand over the bots to me (I'm the technical founder). Everything needs to be well documented.

Demonstration of Expertise: Present previous projects and demonstrable experience in both Botpress and n8n. You must show tangible examples of your work, including case studies or live demos, that highlight your capability to deliver quality solutions.


Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on the latest trends and updates in low-code development, and proactively integrate best practices into your solutions.

Requirements:

Proven Experience: Demonstrable portfolio or case studies in deploying both Botpress and n8n for client projects.

Technical Proficiency: Deep understanding of low-code development paradigms, API integrations, and workflow automation best practices, agentic development. 

Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to customize solutions based on diverse client needs.

Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills for effective collaboration and presentation. Also, excellent internet connection and ability to articulate your thoughts or the problems.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should submit the following:

- A brief cover letter outlining your experience with Botpress and n8n.

- Portfolio or links/demos of previous projects where you have implemented these tools.

- Your rate and availability.

- Any additional information that showcases your approach to high-quality consultancy work.

This is a long-term work where, upon successful delivery of a couple of projects, we will trust you with bigger ones. 

If you don't have real-world AI solutions you sold, don't apply. This is not a training job, but I want really experienced people to rely on.

P.S. Any AI automatically generated cover letter will be rejected automatically. I want to get to know you in this letter, so feel free to get personal.
